name: CryoBreak
description:
CryoBreak is a 2D Sidescroller Action Game where you play as Blondo Rubio, a former guard working for Leaf Systems, the biggest scientific research company in the region. 

A group of terrorists try to break into one of the laboratories inside Leaf Systems, to steal a High Tech prototype, a device known as the CRYOBREAK, it lets its user to cryogenically freeze their body for a set amount of time in order to skip days, months and even years into the future.

The guards at the company tried to stop the terrorists, resulting in casualties from both sides, all the terrorists and all the guards died, except Blondo, who was taking a break and returned to see all the mess, as an act of panic he grabbed the CRYO BREAK and ran away, and now he's being chased by an army of robots created by the company and also the CEO of Leaf Systems Itself.

CRYOBREAK features pixel art graphics in the style of games released for the Gameboy Advance, in all its 260 x 140 glory!

Use the freezing device to skip time, when the seasons change, elements on the level will be affected, take this to your advantage to melt ice, set grass on fire, find secrets and kill enemies in creative ways!
